description: Sum of 6th powers of digits of n.
comments: The only fixed points (n = 0, 1 and 548834) are listed in row 6 of A252648. - _M. F. Hasler_, Apr 12 2015
links: Index entries for Colombian or self numbers and related sequences
formula: a(n) = sum{k>0, (floor(n/10^k)-10*floor(n/10^(k+1)))^6}. - _Hieronymus Fischer_, Jun 25 2007a(10n+k) = a(n)+k^6, 0<=k<10. - _Hieronymus Fischer_, Jun 25 2007
maple: for n from 0 to 3 do seq(n^6+j^6, j=0..9 ); od; - _Zerinvary Lajos_, Nov 06 2006
prog: (MAGMA) [0] cat [&+[d^6: d in Intseq(n)]: n in [1..40]]; // _Bruno Berselli_, Feb 01 2013(PARI) A055015(n)=sum(i=1,#n=digits(n),n[i]^6) \\ _M. F. Hasler_, Apr 12 2015
author: _Henry Bottomley_, May 31 2000
